headline.0: Disharmony Between Yoga Teachers and Students: Why Students Must Eventually Leave the Teacher

short_description.0: At some point, every student must leave their teacher. It's a built-in principle of yoga.  Parents raise children to be able to survive on their own at some point; its the same concept between teachers and students of yoga.

authors.0:
Alanna Kaivalya, Ph.D., Contributor
